content.value:
This city is complete with everything from cozy coffee corners to places to shop til you drop and/or dance til you drop. Enjoy the hipster neighborhoods of the north, take a trip to the museums in the city center, or head to the mountains for breathtaking views.
Selina Bogotá North is located in Zona Rosa, the coolest part of one of South America’s most modern cities. The buildings are beautiful and the streets are safe and pedestrian friendly.

We’ve got an array of accommodation options for every budget. Stay in our dormitories, standard, private, or single rooms. Deluxe and family rooms also available.

Chapinero, Bogota is an affluent, urban Colombian neighborhood set between Calle 39, Avenida Caracas, Calle 100, and the Eastern Hills. It’s the perfect district for anyone looking to experience this city like a local. It is actually a sprawling set of neighborhoods that consist of university students, a considerably large and influential LGBTQ community, a thriving financial district, and artistic bohemian restaurants, bars, and shops. It boasts impressive modern and contemporary brick designs that blend with the general colonial aesthetic. Some of the most impressive designs demonstrate curved profiles and stepped balconies that were initially designed for lower income families, but are now home to Colombia’s elite. Chapinero, Colombia is the place to experience if you want to know what it’s like to be a Colombian in the 21st century.

description.description: Selina Chapinero Bogotá offers a restaurant and bar, free WiFi and a CoWorking Space. Swap stories over a game of pool, catch up in our common area or share recipes in our communal kitchen. We offer a variety of art & cultural activities where our guest can enjoy the Selina experience to the fullest. Also, Selina travelers can enjoy our Yoga deck & lessons. Have fun with the parties and social events, so you can have a memorable time.
